objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 1-1
objectives.description: Begin "Flames of Prayer" from any area adjoining a mog house in one of the starting nations. Requirement: Lv.3+

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 1-2
objectives.description: Complete your home nation's missions up to rank 3 and begin "A Land After Time." Requirement: Completed "Flames of Prayer."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 1-3
objectives.description: Complete your home nation's missions up to rank 6 and begin "Volto Oscuro." Requirement: Completed "A Land After Time."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-1
objectives.description: Examine the Oaken Door in Norg (K-8) and complete up to "Crashing Waves." Requirement: Completed "Ring My Bell."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-2
objectives.description: Examine the Door: "Marble Bridge" in Upper Jueno (F-7) and complete up to "Inescapable Binds." Requirement: Completed "Crashing Waves."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-3
objectives.description: Examine the Imperial Whitegate in Aht Urhgan Whitegate (L-9) and complete up to "Reunited." Requirements: Completed "Desert Winds." Completed "Inescapable Binds."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-4
objectives.description: Enter Alzadaal Undersea Ruins and complete up to "From the Ruins." Requirement: Completed "Reunited."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-5
objectives.description: Complete up to "Of Light and Darkness" by examining any of the Cavernous Maws in the following locations: Batallia Downs (H-5), Rolanberry Fields (H-6), Sauromugue Champaign (K-9). Requirement: Completed "From the Ruins."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-6
objectives.description: Examine the ??? target in Misareaux Coast (G-5) and complete up to "The Decisive Heroine." Requirement: Completed "Of Light and Darkness"

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-7
objectives.description: Complete up to "Over the Rainbow" By visiting any of the Shattered Telepoints in the following locations: La Theine Plateau (J-8), Konschtat Highlands (I-7), Tahrongi Canyon (I-6). Requirement: Completed "The Decisive Heroine"

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-8
objectives.description: Enter Escha - Ru'Aun and complete up to "Banished." Requirement: Completed "Over the Rainbow."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 2-9
objectives.description: Complete up to "Uncertain Futures" By visiting any of the Shattered Telepoints in the following locations: La Theine Plateau (J-8), Konschtat Highlands (I-7), Tahrongi Canyon (j-6).[sic] Requirement: Completed "Banished".

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-1
objectives.description: Begin "Darkness Beckons" from any area adjoining a mob house in one of the starting nations. Requirement: Completed "Uncertain Futures"

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-2
objectives.description: Arrive at Reisenjima and complete up to "The Crucible." Requirement: Completed "Darkness Beckons."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-3
objectives.description: Enter Ceizak Battlegrounds and complete up to "Tears of the Generals." Requirement: Completed "The Crucible"

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-4
objectives.description: Speak to Ploh Trishbahk in Eastern Adoulin (K-9) and complete up to "Eyes on You." Requirement: Completed "Tears of the Generals."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-5
objectives.description: Enter the Hall of the Gods and complete up to "Become Something More." Requirement: Completed "Eyes on You"

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-6
objectives.description: Enter Reisenjima Sanctorium and complete up to "Unshakable Nightmares." Requirement: Completed "Become Something More."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-7
objectives.description: Enter the Walk of Echoes and complete up to "Sin." Requirement: Completed "Unshakable Nightmares."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-8
objectives.description: Inspect the Transcendental Radiance in Desuetia - Empyreal Paradox and complete up to "Vessel of Light." Requirement: Completed "Sin."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-9
objectives.description: Enter Reisenjima Sanctorium and complete up to "Way to Divinity." Requirement: Completed "Vessel of Light."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-10
objectives.description: Enter the Empyreal Paradox and complete up to "An Unending Song." Requirement: Completed "Way to Divinity."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-11
objectives.description: Enter any area adjoining a mog house in one of the starting nations and complete up to "Absolute Trust." Requirement: Completed "An Unending Song."

objectives.name: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Chapter 3-12
objectives.description: Complete "A Rhapsody for the Ages." First time completion of this objective will confer a 10% capacity point bonus. Requirement: Completed "Absolute Trust."

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes I (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Hildesvini) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Wajaom Woodlands (H-13).
Quickest Transportation: Unity (135) Teleportation to Wajaom Woodlands.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes II (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Mokkuralfi) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Mount Zhayolm (I-10).
Quickest Transportation: Voidwatch Teleportation to Mount Zhayolm.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes III (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Vampyr Jarl) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Caedarva Mire Hediva Isle (I-6).
Quickest Transportation: Unity (135) Teleportation to Caedarva Mire.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes IV (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Gorgimera) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Beaucedine Glacier (K-6).
Quickest Transportation: Home Point to Fei'Yin and cast Escape.
Alternate: Unity (128) Teleportation to Fei'Yin, and then run back to Beaucedine Glacier.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes V (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Ariri Samariri) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Palborough Mines (G-10) Map 3.
Quickest Transportation: Home Point #1 Teleportation to Palborough Mines.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes VI (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Hrungnir) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Aydeewa Subterrane Map 2 (E-7).
Quickest Transportation: Survival Guide Teleportation to Aydeewa Subterrane.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes VII (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Morbol Emperor) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Arrapago Reef Map 3 (H-6).
Quickest Transportation: Survival Guide Teleportation to Caedarva Mire, and then run East, back to Arrapago Reef.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes VIII (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Stoorworm) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Reisenjima Etheral Ingress #9.
Quickest Transportation: Dimensional Ring to Reisenjima > Ethereal Ingress #9 Warp.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes IX (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Dendainsonne) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Western Altepa Desert (I-6)
Quickest Transportation: Unity Warp (125) Teleportation to Western Altepa Desert, the Peculiar Footprints is to the North West of where you zone in.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes X (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Freke) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Batallia Downs (J-7) (on the road).
Quickest Transportation: Home Point teleportation to Upper Jeuno #1 (E) then zone into Batallia Downs.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes XI (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Tanngrisnir) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Qufim Island (G-8).
Quickest Transportation: Home Point teleportation to Qufim Island.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes XII (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Nihhus) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Kamihr Drifts (F-8).
Quickest Transportation: Home Point to Ra'Kaznar Inner Court and cast Escape.
Alternate: Waypoint enigmatic device warp to Outer Ra'Kaznar, then walk out the door.

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes XIII (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Hakenmann) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Rala Waterways (N-5).
Quickest Transportation: Home Point #1 teleportation to Eastern Adoulin, then enter Rala Waterways at (F-7).

objectives.name: Peculiar Foes XIV (M)
objectives.description:
(Monthly) Vanquish the fiend (Awoken Andhrimnir) that appears at the Peculiar Footprints in Newton Movalpolos (L-9).

Alternate: Survival Guide Teleportation to Castle Zvahl Baileys, and then run back to Xarcabard.
